content: "If you want to maximize your impact, do a startup."Astasia Myers, General Partner at Felicis, recently sat down with some of the most impactful minds in AI:Ion Stoica – Executive Chairman & co-founder of Anyscale and Databricks, professor at University of California, Berkeley, and creator/contributor to Ray, Apache Spark, and Chatbot Arena.Charles Packer & Sarah Wooders, PhD – Co-founders of Letta and creators of MemGPT.They dive into:• The leap from academia to entrepreneurship• Building developer communities with open-source• Letta’s vision for AI agents with memory and state• Scaling compute beyond inference• How to build AI apps we can trust in productionWatch if you're thinking about the future of AI agents or building in the AI infra space. Full video: https://lnkd.in/gqCFExVK
